properties.title: Hoher Kasten revolving restaurant
properties.abstract: On the Hoher Kasten you can enjoy a marvellous all-round view. In the revolving restaurant, the landscape slowly glides past as you enjoy the specialities.
properties.description: The restaurant revolves for you on the Hoher Kasten. Allow yourself to be spoilt with culinary specialities and enjoy the unique view in all directions. The Alpstein range during aperitif, the hills of the Appenzellerland during salad, Lake Constance for the main course and the St. Galler Rhine valley during dessert. In the distance you can see mountain tops in Bavaria, Vorarlberg, Tirol, Liechtenstein, Grisons and the St. Galler Oberland. You can dive into this world of wonder â€“ and then the cable car can gently take you back to the valley.
properties.name: Appenzellerland Tourismus AI
